questions.question: You are a student with an A2 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 60 words. Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it; who went; what happenedâ€¦?

answers.answer: One of my favourite holidays was in Barcelona with my family. We rented a lovely apartment in the Gothic Quarter and spent our days exploring the city's rich history, sampling delicious tapas, and relaxing on the beach. One unforgettable moment was when we watched a mesmerising flamenco performance at a local restaurant, surrounded by the vibrant atmosphere of the city. It was a truly magical experience that I will always cherish.
